name: HART Signature 20 oz. Axe with SureGrip Overmold
description: Make a bigger impact with the HART 20 oz. Axe. Outdoor striking tools haven't changed much in the last one hundred years. Until now. The HART 20 oz. Axe is equipped with an arsenal of Signature Features including face cutouts, a forged head, SureGrip Over mold and includes a face cover to protect the axe when in storage. With HART's superior performance and innovative Signature Features, you can be assured that with HART Nothing Hits Harder.California residents: see Proposition 65 informationFace cutouts to prevent sticking in woodFully forged for greater strength and lifeAnti-vibration for dampening the shock of impactSureGrip handle for maximum comfort and grip
